targets.query:
reb=from(bucket: "AHK-AKDL")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "EPIC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["power_analyze"]=="mreb") )
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")


  gas=from(bucket: "EPIC")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "EPIC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["power_analyze"]=="gasgen1") or  r["power_analyze"]=="gG2")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

disal=from(bucket: "EPIC")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "EPIC")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "E")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["power_analyze"]=="digen1") or r["power_analyze"]=="digen2")
  |> group(columns: ["customer"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> difference(nonNegative: true)
  |> drop(columns: ["_time", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")


  union(tables: [reb, gas,disal])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

dy1=from(bucket: "AHK-AKDL")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/AKH_TN2305170/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/AKH/AKDL/elec/main/dyeing1/flow")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "b4e8152ce659")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])

  dy2=from(bucket: "AHK-AKDL")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["topic"] == "tn/emr/AKH_TN2305180/tx"  ))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "FLOW1_NCING/AKH/AKDL/elec/main/dyeing2/flow")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value /(3600.0) }))
    |> drop(columns: ["_measurement", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_field", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_stop", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["customer", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["device", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["group", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["panel_board", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["power_analyze", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["topic", "tag"])
  |> drop(columns: ["utility_type", "tag"])
  |> sum(column: "_value")

    union(tables: [dy1, dy2])
  |>sum(column: "_value")

from(bucket: "EPIC")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["customer"] == "NCING")
